about_the_game:
The Scout Pack opens up the mythical world of Taborea! Boost your strength in combat and speed up your development – with the support of loyal pets, you’ll always return safely to your luxury home.

Contents:

Impressive Costume of the Storm
Take Taborea by storm with this unique complete costume set for men and women, including wings!

Stalwart Adventurer
Increase all attributes by 85 in one fell swoop. Also, increase the experience you gain and your movement speed by 10%, and your drop rate by 20%.

Purple Cloudburster Mount (Permanent)
Ride through Taborea on a purple thundercloud!

Onyx Kitsune Pet Egg
Summon the magnificent Onyx Kitsune as your pet.

Class Maximum Expansion Ticket
Smash the limits and obtain qualification for an additional class.

Luxurious Two-Story Wooden House with Basement Contract
Retreat to your own four walls in between adventures and kick back in extreme luxury.

Important:
  • The items will be tied to the account you use to log into the game after purchase.
  • Then visit the shop in the game and open your depot to send the items to your inventory.
  • You can only purchase the DLC once per account.

subs.option_text: Runes of Magic – Scout Pack - $24.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Runes of Magic – Scout Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible with 128 MB RAM and Pixel Shader 2.0 support (or higher)
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection, keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 6800 / ATI X800 min. 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection, keyboard and mouse

short_description: The Scout Pack opens up the mythical world of Taborea! Boost your strength in combat and speed up your development – with the support of loyal pets, you’ll always return safely to your luxury home.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
